data.title: Joaquin Phoenix News, Pictures, and Videos
data.meta_description: Get the latest and most updated news, videos, and photo galleries about Joaquin Phoenix
data.text:
Rooney Mara Is Pregnant, Expecting Baby No. 2 With Joaquin Phoenix

Rooney Mara is pregnant with her and Joaquin Phoenix's second baby three years after welcoming their son River. See a photo of the actress' growing baby bump.

See Lady Gaga Dressed as Harley Quinn on Joker: Folie à Deux Film Set

Lady Gaga is seen for the first time in costume on the set of Todd Phillips' sequel to the 2019 film starring Joaquin Phoenix. See photos from the New York City set!

This First Look at Lady Gaga in Joker: Folie à Deux Deserves a Round of Applause

Lady Gaga shared a sneak peek into her role as Harley Quinn in the upcoming musical sequel to Todd Phillips' 2019 film Joker. Don't look away from this preview.

Why Josh Hartnett Says Stepping Away From Hollywood Was the "Best Thing for My Mental Health"

In an interview on the Australian morning show Sunrise, Josh Hartnett shared why keeping "Hollywood at bay" and leaving the limelight was the best decision for his mental health.

Reese Witherspoon's Love for Country: Live From E! Rewind

It's been 16 years since Reese Witherspoon played June Carter Cash in "Walk The Line." In honor, check out these throwback interviews with Joaquin Phoenix & Reese!

Joaquin Phoenix Debuts Half-Shaved Head at New York Film Festival

While promoting his upcoming project C’mon C’mon, Joaquin Phoenix was photographed on the red carpet with a new haircut. See his new style just in time for the premiere.

Joaquin Phoenix Makes Rare Comment About Raising His and Rooney Mara's Son River

What is Joaquin Phoenix like as a dad? The Her actor shared his hot take on McDonald's Happy Meals and explained whether his son, River, will be raised vegan.

New Mom Rooney Mara Shares How Son River Has Impacted Her Outlook on Life

Actress Rooney Mara shared the impact son River has had on her life so far. Scroll on for details surrounding the new mom’s heartfelt letter.

A Look at How We Talk About Actors vs. Actresses Losing Weight for Roles

Nominated for an Oscar for her portrayal of Billie Holiday, Andra Day's "extreme" weight loss for the role made headlines.

Are You Not Entertained By These 20 Secrets About Gladiator?

Russell Crowe and Joaquin Phoenix faced off more than 20 years ago in Gladatior; but did you know Phoenix so nervous to film he almost quit the iconic movie?

Kate Mara Recalls Health Ledger Taking Her "Under His Wing" While Filming Brokeback Mountain

During a recent interview, Kate Mara recalled working with the late Heath Ledger on the set of Brokeback Mountain. Keep scrolling for the touching details.

Rooney Mara and Joaquin Phoenix Break Silence on Their Baby Boy's Birth

More than a month after welcoming their first child together, Rooney Mara and Joaquin Phoenix open up about their baby boy in an op-ed addressing the migrant children crisis.

Rooney Mara Gives Birth, Welcomes First Baby With Joaquin Phoenix

According to director Victor Kossakovsky, Rooney Mara and Joaquin Phoenix recently welcomed their first child together, a baby boy.

Rooney Mara & Joaquin Phoenix Are Expecting Their First Child

The actress and her Oscar-winning partner are going to be parents. Get the exciting pregnancy details.

Rooney Mara Is Pregnant, Expecting First Child With Joaquin Phoenix

Rooney Mara and Joaquin Phoenix are expecting their first child together. Get the pregnancy details!

Joaquin Phoenix and Rooney Mara Look More in Love Than Ever Celebrating His Oscars Win

Joaquin Phoenix and Rooney Mara were all smiles celebrating the Joker star's 2020 Oscar win with vegan burgers.

The 9 Biggest Jaw-Droppers at the 2020 Oscars

The acting wins were indeed set in stone, but that doesn't mean the 92nd Academy Awards didn't have its shocking moments

Joaquin Phoenix Shares River Phoenix's Words in a Plea for Our Common Humanity in Poignant Oscar Speech

Joaquin Phoenix wins his first Oscar for his turn as the unraveling Arthur Fleck in Todd Phllips' dark supervillain origin story and has a few things to say about our shared humanity

One Role, 2 Oscar Journeys: Inside Joaquin Phoenix's and Heath Ledger's Approaches to Joker

Heath Ledger, who passed away in 2008, won a posthumous Oscar for his performance in The Dark Knight. Now, Joaquin Phoenix is up for an award for his work in Joker
